verses.verse: <S%G1511>that<s%> older <S%G4246>men<s%> should <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4998>temperate,<s%> <S%G3524>sensible,<s%> sober <S%G4998>minded,<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> and in <S%G5281>patience:<s%>

and <S%G3361>that<s%> older <S%G4247>women<s%> <S%G5615>likewise<s%> be <S%G2412>reverent<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2688>behavior,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1228>slanderers<s%> <S%G3361>nor<s%> <S%G1402>enslaved<s%> to <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> teachers of that which is <S%G2567>good;<s%>
<S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G4994>train<s%> the young <S%G3501>women<s%> <S%G1511><s%> <S%G4994><s%> to love their <S%G5362>husbands,<s%> to love their <S%G5388>children,<s%>

to be sober <S%G4998>minded,<s%> <S%G53>chaste,<s%> workers at <S%G3626>home,<s%> <S%G18>kind,<s%> being in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3056>word<s%> may <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G987>be<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed.<s%>

and <S%G5199>soundness<s%> of <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G176>can't<s%> be condemned; <S%G2443>that<s%> he <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1727>opposes<s%> you may be <S%G1788>ashamed,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> evil <S%G5337>thing<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> about <S%G5216>us.<s%>

Exhort <S%G1401>servants<s%> to be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1203>masters,<s%> and <S%G1511>to<s%> be <S%G2101>well-pleasing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3361>things;<s%> not <S%G483>contradicting;<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G3084>redeem<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G458>iniquity,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2511>purify<s%> for <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%> for his own <S%G4041>possession,<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> for <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>
